entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
